CustomField.description: The Interaction Processor adds the Contact ID to the beginning of this key to match on Opportunities. If this field is blank, no Opportunity will be created. Contact ID + this key should equal the Opportunity Key also updated through workflow.
CustomField.formula:
CASESAFEID(Contact__r.Id)+ TEXT(TIMENOW()) +
IF(Academic_Program__c + Recruitment_Program__c = "","",
IF(OR(ISPICKVAL(Academic_Program__r.Career__c, "Undergraduate"), AND(ISBLANK(Academic_Program__c), ISPICKVAL(Recruitment_Program__r.Career__c, "Undergraduate"))), ".Undergraduate" + Term__r.Id,
".Graduate." + Term__r.Id +
IF(ISBLANK(Academic_Program__r.Id), Recruitment_Program__r.Id, IF(ISBLANK(Academic_Program__r.Recruitment_Program__c), Academic_Program__r.Id, Academic_Program__r.Recruitment_Program__r.Id))))
CustomField.label: Opportunity Key
